name: Residents of Z Street
description:
Residents of Z Street is a 3D shooter developed in Unreal Engine 4.  

 *This is a demo version of the game*

Synopsis:  The old residents have risen from the grave and your neighbors are infected.  How long will you survive the night until you join the community of the dead... 

Make every shot count!

Gameplay Features:

- First-person character and movement mechanics

-Different weapons multiple types (automatic fire, burst fire, explosive, etc)

- Round-based spawning system

- Purchasable weapons and obstacles

Keyboard Controls:

*WASD for Player Movement

*Space Bar to Jump

*E to Interact

*1 & 2 for weapon switch

*R to Reload

*Point and click with mouse (hold right click to aim down sights) to look and shoot. 

Recommended:

Operating System: Windows 10 64-bit

Processor:  Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster

Memory:  8 GB RAM

Graphics:  Direct X or Direct 12 compatible graphics card. Geforce GTX 570 / AMD Radeon HD 7850 or better

Storage:  1 GB available space

Socials:
